name: Velvet Matte Lipstick
description: Luxurious velvet matte lipstick with long-lasting, vibrant color and a comfortable, non-drying finish.

name: Hydrating Foundation
description: Lightweight, buildable foundation that provides natural coverage and keeps skin hydrated all day.

name: Volumizing Mascara
description: Achieve dramatic volume and length with this smudge-proof and clump-free mascara.

name: Eyeshadow Palette
description: Versatile eyeshadow palette featuring highly pigmented, blendable shades for endless looks.

name: Radiant Blush
description: A silky-smooth blush that adds a natural flush of color and a healthy radiance to your cheeks.

name: Glossy Lip Tint
description: A non-sticky lip tint that delivers a sheer wash of color and a brilliant, long-lasting shine.

name: Setting Spray
description: Lock in your makeup all day with this lightweight, refreshing setting spray.

name: Liquid Eyeliner
description: Achieve a precise, long-lasting line with this smudge-proof liquid eyeliner.
